alert.note: Alert for Coastal Gulf; Inland Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 1:42PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Gulf, southeastern Bay and southwestern Liberty Counties through 215 PM EDT/115 PM CDT/... At 142 PM EDT/1242 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mexico Beach, or 9 miles north of Port St. Joe, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mexico Beach, Stonemill Creek, Tyndall Air Force Base, Wewahitchka, Overstreet, Honeyville, Davis Beach, Chipola Cutoff, Beacon Hill, Dalkeith and Saint Joe Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
